Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Western.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Western. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
